data.message: I saw Justin back at the 02 in 2009 i couldn't afford tickets for the last 02 gig but in my time of going to concerts like Madonna, Rihanna Coldplay etc I have always maintained that he is and always will be the best live act I have ever seen! This man can dance sing and make a crowd perform to his every breath. I would love to take my daughter of 14 to see him so she can see that what I've gone on about for years  is true!!
